value: good morning !. . . did you sleep well? . . . today is monday, first work day of the week. it is a new week, and a new opportunity to change your life and the world! and what you must do today is plan the week ahead.
good morning !. . . did you get good rest? . . . today is tuesday, you should be fine, not tired yet! be sure to try and get a lot of money today
good morning !. . . are you well rested? . . . today is wednesday, the middle of the work week. is your week 50% complete? because it should be. if it is not, then pick up the pace.
good morning !. . . feel that smell of coffee? . . . smells like energy to make this week worthwile! today is thursday, you are doing well and must continue your mission
good morning !. . . did you have good dreams? . . . today is finally friday, at night we can step out the gas pedal, but until then, we are focused. okay?
Have you parsed through your finances this week yet?
